Appendix M¶

Appendix M: Energy from Photovoltaic (PV) technology, small and micro wind turbines and small- scale hydro-electric generators¶

sap.appendix.appendix_m.configure_wind_turbines(dwelling)[source]¶

Set the wind turbine speed correction factor wind_turbine_speed_correction_factor if the dwelling has 1 or more wind turbines, using interpolated values from Table M1

Parameters:dwelling –
Returns:
sap.appendix.appendix_m.m1_correction_factor(terrain_type, wind_speed)[source]¶

Interpolate the correction factor for the given terrain type and standardised wind speed using Table M1

Parameters:

  • wind_speed –
Returns:
